Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2014 01:39PM TTfan wrote: Any other T/H hair experiences? I'm just had round 4 of 12. After round 3 I noticed quite a bit of shedding and decided to shave it off rather than leaving a trail behind me. A week later I have lots of prickly stubble re growth and feeling like I should have waited as it's still growing some. It's super thin on top though, so probably just as well not to do what someone on these boards called "my long, painful breakup with my hair".
Posts.Title: Taxol and Herceptin - hair loss Luckydog42 TTfan
